name: Mighty Slap
description:
Mighty Slap is a Player vs Player Turn Based slapping game. Time your slap with a time based bonus multiplier to land a powerful slap to your opponent. First player to knock out the opponent wins.



There's only one control which is to time your slap.
There's a set of characters to choose from which are meant solely for visual purpose and one character does not provide any advantage over the other is any way.

We do plan to add more mechanics to the game and hoping to work with community input to improve further and decide the future of this game.
